alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Gilmer; Gordon; Murray; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 4:44PM EDT until July 20 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Gilmer County in north central Georgia... Southeastern Murray County in northwestern Georgia... Southeastern Whitfield County in northwestern Georgia... Northern Gordon County in northwestern Georgia... Fannin County in north central Georgia... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 444 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Epworth to Mill Creek, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dalton, Calhoun, Chatsworth, Ellijay, Blue Ridge, Resaca, Morganton, Jones Mill, Higdon, Redbud, Loving, Cohutta Wilderness, Epworth, Mineral Bluff, Cherry Log, Fort Mountain State Park, Carters, Hemp, Tails Creek and Ramhurst. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
